event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction cache miss
event.description: Each instruction fetch from normal cacheable memory that causes a refill from the L2 memory system generates this event. Accesses that do not cause a new cache refill, but are satisfied from refilling data of a previous miss are not counted.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data cache miss
event.description: Each data read from or write to normal cacheable memory that causes a refill from the L2 memory system generates this event. Accesses that do not cause a new cache refill, but are satisfied from refilling data of a previous miss are not counted.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Each access to a cache line is counted including the multiple transactions of an LDM, STM, or other operations. CP15 cache maintenance operations do not count as events

event.title: Data
event.name: Data Read
event.description: Data Read architecturally executed. This event occurs for every instruction that explicitly reads data, including SWP.

event.title: Data
event.name: Data Write
event.description: Data Write architecturally executed. This event occurs for every instruction that explicitly writes data, including SWP.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Instruction Executed
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Dual-issued Pair Executed
event.description: Dual-issued pair of instructions architecturally executed.

event.title: Exception
event.name: Taken
event.description: This event occurs on each exception taken.

event.title: Exception
event.name: Return
event.description: Exception return architecturally executed. This event occurs on every exception return.

event.title: Context ID
event.name: Change
event.description: Change to Context ID executed.

event.title: Program Counter
event.name: SW change
event.description: Software changed the PC, except by an exception, architecturally executed.

event.title: Branch
event.name: Instruction executed
event.description: B immediate, BL immediate or BLX immediate instruction architecturally executed (taken or not taken).

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Returns
event.description: Procedure return architecturally executed, other than exception returns, for example, BZ Rm, LDM Rn, {..,PC}.

event.title: Access
event.name: Unaligned
event.description: This event occurs for each instruction that was to an unaligned address that either triggered an alignment fault, or would have done so if the SCTLR A-bit had been set.

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Branch mispredicted or not predicted.

event.title: Branch
event.name: Predicted
event.description: Branches or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor.

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: Instruction stall
event.description: Stall because instruction buffer cannot deliver an instruction. This can indicate an instruction cache miss. This event occurs every cycle where the condition is present.

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: Dependency stall
event.description: Stall because of a data dependency between instructions. This event occurs every cycle where the condition is present.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Write-back
event.description: Data cache write-back. This event occurs once for each line that is written back from the cache.

event.title: External
event.name: Access
event.description: External memory request. Examples of this are cache refill, Non-cacheable accesses, write-through writes, cache line evictions (write-back).

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: LSU busy
event.description: Stall because of LSU being busy. This event takes place each clock cycle where the condition is met. A high incidence of this event indicates the pipeline is often waiting for transactions to complete on the external bus.

event.title: Store Buffer
event.name: Drains
event.description: Store buffer was forced to drain completely. Examples of this are DMB, Strongly-ordered memory access, or similar events.

event.title: Interrupt
event.name: FIQ Disabled
event.description: The number of cycles FIQ interrupts are disabled.

event.title: Store Buffer
event.name: IRQ Disabled
event.description: The number of cycles IRQ interrupts are disabled.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst tag or parity error
event.description: Instruction cache tag RAM parity or correctable ECC error.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst parity error
event.description: Instruction cache data RAM parity or correctable ECC error.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data tag or parity error
event.description: Data cache tag or dirty RAM parity error or correctable ECC error.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data parity error
event.description: Data cache data RAM parity error or correctable ECC error

event.title: TCM
event.name: Error Prefetch
event.description: TCM fatal ECC error reported from the prefetch unit.

event.title: TCM
event.name: Error Load/Store
event.description: TCM fatal ECC error reported from the load/store unit.

event.title: Store Buffer
event.name: Merge
event.description: Store buffer merge.

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: LSU store buffer full
event.description: LSU stall caused by full store buffer.

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: LSU store queue full
event.description: LSU stall caused by store queue full.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Integer divide
event.description: Integer divide instruction, SDIV or UDIV, executed.

event.title: Pipeline
event.name: Integer divide stall
event.description: Stall cycle caused by integer divide.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Linefill initiated
event.description: PLD instruction that initiates a linefill.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Linefill not initiated
event.description: PLD instruction that did not initiate a linefill because of a resource shortage.

event.title: Bus
event.name: Non-cachable access
event.description: Non-cacheable access on AXI master bus.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction cache access
event.description: Instruction cache access. This is an analog to event 0x04 (Data / Cache Access)

event.title: Cache
event.name: Two slots data
event.description: Store buffer operation has detected that two slots have data in same cache line but with different attributes.

event.title: Branch
event.name: Dual issue case A
event.description: Dual issue case A (branch).

event.title: Branch
event.name: Dual issue case B1, B2, F2, F2D
event.description: Dual issue case B1, B2, F2 (load/store), F2D.

event.title: Branch
event.name: Dual issue other
event.description: Dual issue other case.

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Double arithmetic
event.description: Double precision floating point arithmetic or conversion instruction executed.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data ECC error
event.description: Data cache data RAM fatal ECC error.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Tag/dirty ECC error
event.description: Data cache tag/dirty RAM fatal ECC error.

event.title: Processor
event.name: Livelock
event.description: Processor livelock because of hard errors or exception at exception vector.

event.title: ATCM
event.name: Multi-bit error
event.description: ATCM multi-bit ECC error.

event.title: B0TCM
event.name: Multi-bit error
event.description: B0TCM multi-bit ECC error.

event.title: B1TCM
event.name: Multi-bit error
event.description: B1TCM multi-bit ECC error.

event.title: ATCM
event.name: Single-bit error
event.description: ATCM single-bit ECC error.

event.title: B0TCM
event.name: Single-bit error
event.description: B0TCM single-bit ECC error.

event.title: B1TCM
event.name: Single-bit error
event.description: B1TCM single-bit ECC error.

event.title: TCM
event.name: Load/Store error
event.description: TCM correctable ECC error reported by load/store unit.

event.title: TCM
event.name: Prefetch error
event.description: TCM correctable ECC error reported by prefetch unit.

event.title: TCM
event.name: AXI slave fatal error
event.description: TCM fatal ECC error reported by AXI slave interface.

event.title: TCM
event.name: AXI slave error
event.description: TCM correctable ECC error reported by AXI slave interface.
